text: my name is Alex Wong I'm the director of
marketing at smart simple software smart
simple is a platform solution we are a
process automation platform what makes
us unique is our platform is a hundred
percent configurable so whatever unique
or obscure requirements our clients have
with regards to their processes we're
able to authentically track and recreate
their processes on the cloud using our
software technology at the federal level
we work with the US Treasury as well as
the Department of Defense at the state
level we work with a whole host of state
agencies across the continent of the
United States Florida Tennessee
Mississippi the state of Washington for
example so a good number of them across
the u.s. we've been with AWS since 2013
and we selected AWS because at the time
we wanted to make sure that we were
providing a solution to our clients that
represented the best that that the
market could offer we've been in the
United States for about five years now
at the time when we expanded into the US
we were only operating in Canada but
with the help of AWS we've actually
turned the composition or a business
around and almost 65 percent of our
business now comes from the US I think
what's unique about our solution is our
flexibility I think I mentioned that
earlier and the fact that our platform
is almost endlessly configurable so what
that means for our clients is that how
regardless of how unique the processes
are we're able to authentically recreate
how they run these processes and I think
that's really important when you're
dealing with government agencies because
they do run processes in a specific way
for their own specific reason and it's
not for us to say the way they're
running the process is right or wrong
they do things the way they do things
because it's the most efficient way
according to to how they've always done
things and so for us it's all about
ensuring that we can authentically
recreate the processes that that has
worked for them over the years having a
relationship with AWS and the fact that
we can say that we are a government
competency partner it gets us a foot in
the door
with with a lot of government agencies
and it's a challenge for us because as a
Canadian organization you don't yarn
always afforded that opportunity unless
you can provide some validation while
AWS provides us with that validation and
the fact that we can say that we're a
government compensator is an added level
of I guess validation from from a US
that says that we've worked with
government we've been able to provide
good solutions to our clients and an ADA
